doc:
Robert Belgrade https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Belgrade 0 Robert Belgrade is an American musician and voice actor best known as the original English dubbing voice actor for Alucard in Castlevania: Symphony of the Night and as the announcer in several entries of the Tekken series. Robert_Belgrade is an_American_musician_and_voice_actor best known as the_original_English_dubbing_voice_actor for Alucard in Castlevania : Symphony of the_Night and as the_announcer in several_entries of the_Tekken_series .
